metadata.name: Gaming Industry Semantic Layer
metadata.description: Comprehensive semantic ontology for the gaming industry covering players, games, bets, transactions, and regulatory compliance

entities.label: Player
entities.description: A registered user who participates in gaming activities

properties.label: Player ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the player

properties.label: Alias
properties.description: The player's username or nickname

properties.label: Registration Date
properties.description: The date when the player registered

properties.label: First Deposit Date
properties.description: The date of the player's first deposit

properties.label: Last Login Date
properties.description: The date of the player's last login

properties.label: Date of Birth
properties.description: The player's date of birth

properties.label: Gender
properties.description: The player's gender

properties.label: Country
properties.description: The player's country of residence

properties.label: Currency
properties.description: The player's preferred currency

properties.label: Balance
properties.description: The player's current balance

properties.label: Account Balance
properties.description: The player's real money account balance

properties.label: Bonus Balance
properties.description: The player's bonus balance

properties.label: Affiliate ID
properties.description: The identifier of the affiliate who referred the player

properties.label: Language
properties.description: The player's preferred language

properties.label: Registered Platform
properties.description: The platform on which the player registered

properties.label: Email
properties.description: The player's email address

properties.label: Is Opt-In
properties.description: Whether the player has opted in to communications

properties.label: Is Blocked
properties.description: Whether the player is blocked from playing

properties.label: Is Test
properties.description: Whether the player is a test account

properties.label: VIP Level
properties.description: The player's VIP or loyalty level

properties.label: Total Deposits
properties.description: The total amount deposited by the player

properties.label: Total Withdrawals
properties.description: The total amount withdrawn by the player

properties.label: First Name
properties.description: The player's first name

properties.label: Last Name
properties.description: The player's last name

properties.label: Customer Club Points
properties.description: The player's accumulated loyalty points

properties.label: Wagered
properties.description: The total amount wagered by the player

properties.label: Casino ID
properties.description: The identifier of the casino or white label

properties.label: Revenue EUR
properties.description: The revenue generated by the player in EUR

properties.label: Last Login Platform
properties.description: The platform on which the player last logged in

properties.label: Total Bets Casino
properties.description: The total amount bet by the player in casino games

properties.label: Total Bets Sport
properties.description: The total amount bet by the player in sports

properties.label: Deposits Count Casino
properties.description: The number of deposits made for casino games

properties.label: Deposits Count Sport
properties.description: The number of deposits made for sports betting

properties.label: First Deposit Method
properties.description: The payment method used for the first deposit

properties.label: Last Deposit Method
properties.description: The payment method used for the last deposit

properties.label: Affordability Status
properties.description: The affordability status of the player for responsible gaming

properties.label: Affordability Balance
properties.description: The affordability balance threshold for the player

properties.label: Communication Preferences
properties.description: The player's communication preferences for different channels

properties.label: Responsible Gaming Limits
properties.description: The responsible gaming limits set by the player

properties.label: Player Status
properties.description: The current status of the player account

properties.label: KYC Status
properties.description: The Know Your Customer verification status of the player

properties.label: Risk Score
properties.description: The risk score assigned to the player for compliance purposes

entities.label: Game
entities.description: A gaming product that can be played by users

properties.label: Game ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the game

properties.label: Game Name
properties.description: The name of the game

properties.label: Provider
properties.description: The provider of the game

properties.label: Sub-Provider
properties.description: The sub-provider of the game

properties.label: Game Type
properties.description: The type of the game

properties.label: Game Filters
properties.description: The filters that can be applied to the game

properties.label: Game Order
properties.description: The display order of the game

properties.label: Is Active
properties.description: Whether the game is active

properties.label: Demo Enabled
properties.description: Whether the game can be played in demo mode

properties.label: Wager Percent
properties.description: The percentage of the wager that contributes to wagering requirements

properties.label: Jackpot Contribution
properties.description: The percentage of the wager that contributes to jackpots

properties.label: Payout Low
properties.description: The low end of the payout range

properties.label: Payout High
properties.description: The high end of the payout range

properties.label: Volatility
properties.description: The volatility level of the game

properties.label: UK Compliant
properties.description: Whether the game complies with UK regulations

properties.label: Is Desktop
properties.description: Whether the game is available on desktop

properties.label: Is Mobile
properties.description: Whether the game is available on mobile

properties.label: Server Game ID
properties.description: The game identifier on the provider's server

properties.label: Created Date
properties.description: The date when the game was created

properties.label: Release Date
properties.description: The date when the game was released

properties.label: Updated Date
properties.description: The date when the game was last updated

properties.label: Hide In Lobby
properties.description: Whether the game is hidden in the lobby

properties.label: Excluded Countries
properties.description: Countries where the game is not available

properties.label: Excluded Jurisdictions
properties.description: Jurisdictions where the game is not available

properties.label: Game Description
properties.description: The description of the game

properties.label: Return to Player
properties.description: The theoretical return to player percentage

properties.label: Has Jackpot
properties.description: Whether the game has a jackpot

properties.label: Game Features
properties.description: Special features of the game

entities.label: Transaction
entities.description: A financial transaction within the gaming platform

properties.label: Transaction ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the transaction

properties.label: Player ID
properties.description: The identifier of the player associated with the transaction

properties.label: Transaction Date
properties.description: The date and time of the transaction

properties.label: Transaction Type
properties.description: The type of the transaction

properties.label: Transaction Amount
properties.description: The amount of the transaction

properties.label: Transaction Original Amount
properties.description: The original amount of the transaction before currency conversion

properties.label: Transaction Details
properties.description: Additional details about the transaction

properties.label: Platform
properties.description: The platform on which the transaction occurred

properties.label: Status
properties.description: The status of the transaction

properties.label: Currency Code
properties.description: The currency code of the transaction

properties.label: Payment Method
properties.description: The payment method used for the transaction

properties.label: Payment Provider
properties.description: The payment provider used for the transaction

properties.label: Bonus ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the bonus

properties.label: Bonus Name
properties.description: The name of the bonus

properties.label: Internal Name
properties.description: The internal name of the bonus

properties.label: Description
properties.description: The description of the bonus

properties.label: Percentage
properties.description: The percentage value of the bonus

properties.label: Percentage Up To Amount
properties.description: The maximum amount for percentage bonuses

properties.label: Divisions
properties.description: The number of divisions for the bonus

properties.label: Bonus Amount
properties.description: The fixed amount of the bonus

properties.label: Status
properties.description: The status of the bonus

properties.label: Coupon Code
properties.description: The coupon code to claim the bonus

properties.label: Given Upon
properties.description: The condition for giving the bonus

properties.label: Start Date
properties.description: The start date of the bonus availability

properties.label: End Date
properties.description: The end date of the bonus availability

properties.label: Wager Factor
properties.description: The wagering requirement factor for the bonus

properties.label: Min Deposit
properties.description: The minimum deposit required to qualify for the bonus

properties.label: Bonus Type
properties.description: The type of the bonus

properties.label: Is Sport Bonus
properties.description: Whether the bonus is for sports betting

properties.label: Eligibility Rules
properties.description: Rules that determine player eligibility for the bonus

entities.label: Bonus Balance
entities.description: A bonus balance for a player

properties.label: Bonus Balance ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the bonus balance

properties.label: Player ID
properties.description: The identifier of the player

properties.label: Bonus ID
properties.description: The identifier of the bonus

properties.label: Amount
properties.description: The initial amount of the bonus

properties.label: Balance
properties.description: The current balance of the bonus

properties.label: Status
properties.description: The status of the bonus balance

properties.label: Wager Left
properties.description: The amount left to wager to fulfill requirements

properties.label: Original Deposit Amount
properties.description: The original deposit amount associated with the bonus

properties.label: Max Cashable Winnings
properties.description: The maximum winnings that can be cashed out from the bonus

properties.label: Amount Converted
properties.description: The amount converted to real money

properties.label: Is Sport Bonus
properties.description: Whether the bonus is for sports betting

properties.label: Free Spins Offer
properties.description: The free spins offer associated with the bonus

properties.label: Free Spins Amount
properties.description: The number of free spins granted

properties.label: Free Spins Left
properties.description: The number of free spins remaining

properties.label: Creation Date
properties.description: The date when the bonus balance was created

properties.label: Loss Condition Date
properties.description: The date when the bonus will be lost if conditions are not met

properties.label: Country ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the country

properties.label: Country Name
properties.description: The name of the country

properties.label: Is Active
properties.description: Whether the country is active for gaming

properties.label: Country International Code
properties.description: The international code of the country (ISO)

properties.label: Phone Code
properties.description: The phone code of the country

properties.label: ISO Code
properties.description: The ISO code of the country

properties.label: Jurisdiction Code
properties.description: The jurisdiction code of the country

properties.label: Default Language
properties.description: The default language of the country

properties.label: Default Currency
properties.description: The default currency of the country

properties.label: Jurisdiction ID
properties.description: The identifier of the jurisdiction for the country

properties.label: Regulatory Requirements
properties.description: Special regulatory requirements for the country

entities.label: Currency
entities.description: A currency used on the gaming platform

properties.label: Currency ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the currency

properties.label: Currency Name
properties.description: The name of the currency

properties.label: Currency Symbol
properties.description: The symbol of the currency

properties.label: Currency Code
properties.description: The code of the currency

properties.label: Rate in EUR
properties.description: The exchange rate of the currency to EUR

properties.label: Rate in USD
properties.description: The exchange rate of the currency to USD

properties.label: Rate in GBP
properties.description: The exchange rate of the currency to GBP

properties.label: Multiplier
properties.description: The multiplier for the currency

properties.label: For Languages
properties.description: The languages for which the currency is applicable

entities.label: White Label
entities.description: A branded instance of the gaming platform

properties.label: Label ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the white label

properties.label: Label Name
properties.description: The name of the white label

properties.label: Label URL Name
properties.description: The URL name of the white label

properties.label: Label URL
properties.description: The URL of the white label

properties.label: Default Language
properties.description: The default language of the white label

properties.label: Default Country
properties.description: The default country of the white label

properties.label: Default Currency
properties.description: The default currency of the white label

properties.label: Welcome Bonus Description
properties.description: The description of the welcome bonus for the white label

properties.label: Restricted Countries
properties.description: Countries restricted from accessing the white label

properties.label: Founded Year
properties.description: The year when the white label was founded

properties.label: Sport Enabled
properties.description: Whether sports betting is enabled for the white label

properties.label: Default Play Mode
properties.description: The default play mode for the white label

properties.label: Is Active
properties.description: Whether the white label is active

properties.label: Label Title
properties.description: The title of the white label

properties.label: Excluded Jurisdictions
properties.description: Jurisdictions excluded from the white label

entities.label: Game Session
entities.description: A session of game play by a player

properties.label: Session ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the game session

properties.label: Game ID
properties.description: The identifier of the game being played

properties.label: Player ID
properties.description: The identifier of the player playing the game

properties.label: Total Bet
properties.description: The total amount bet in the session

properties.label: Total Bet Account
properties.description: The total amount bet from the account balance

properties.label: Total Bet Bonus
properties.description: The total amount bet from the bonus balance

properties.label: Total Win
properties.description: The total amount won in the session

properties.label: Total Win Account
properties.description: The total amount won to the account balance

properties.label: Total Win Bonus
properties.description: The total amount won to the bonus balance

properties.label: Round ID
properties.description: The identifier of the game round

properties.label: Game Status
properties.description: The status of the game session

properties.label: Currency ID
properties.description: The identifier of the currency used

properties.label: Creation Date
properties.description: The date when the session was created

properties.label: Updated Date
properties.description: The date when the session was last updated

properties.label: Account Balance
properties.description: The account balance at the end of the session

properties.label: Bonus Balance
properties.description: The bonus balance at the end of the session

properties.label: Device
properties.description: The device used for the game session

properties.label: IP Address
properties.description: The IP address used for the game session

entities.label: Sport Bet
entities.description: A sports betting wager placed by a player

properties.label: Bet ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the bet

properties.label: Player ID
properties.description: The identifier of the player placing the bet

properties.label: Bet Amount
properties.description: The amount of the bet

properties.label: Potential Win
properties.description: The potential winning amount

properties.label: Actual Win
properties.description: The actual winning amount

properties.label: Bet Type
properties.description: The type of the bet

properties.label: Odd Type ID
properties.description: The identifier of the odd type

properties.label: Sport ID
properties.description: The identifier of the sport

properties.label: Region ID
properties.description: The identifier of the region

properties.label: Competition ID
properties.description: The identifier of the competition

properties.label: Match ID
properties.description: The identifier of the match

properties.label: Market ID
properties.description: The identifier of the market

properties.label: Is Live
properties.description: Whether the bet is live

properties.label: Bet State
properties.description: The state of the bet

properties.label: Placed Date
properties.description: The date when the bet was placed

properties.label: Settled Date
properties.description: The date when the bet was settled

properties.label: Odds
properties.description: The odds of the bet

properties.label: Selection Name
properties.description: The name of the selection

entities.label: Sport Event
entities.description: A sporting event on which bets can be placed

properties.label: Event ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the event

properties.label: Event Name
properties.description: The name of the event

properties.label: Sport ID
properties.description: The identifier of the sport

properties.label: Region ID
properties.description: The identifier of the region

properties.label: Competition ID
properties.description: The identifier of the competition

properties.label: Start Date
properties.description: The start date and time of the event

properties.label: End Date
properties.description: The end date and time of the event

properties.label: Status
properties.description: The status of the event

properties.label: Is Live
properties.description: Whether the event is currently live

properties.label: Competitors
properties.description: The competitors participating in the event

properties.label: Markets
properties.description: The betting markets available for the event

entities.label: Big Winner
entities.description: A record of a significant winning by a player

properties.label: Transaction ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the transaction

properties.label: Player ID
properties.description: The identifier of the player who won

properties.label: Game ID
properties.description: The identifier of the game in which the win occurred

properties.label: Amount
properties.description: The amount of the win

properties.label: Date
properties.description: The date and time of the win

properties.label: Player Name
properties.description: The name of the player who won

properties.label: Country
properties.description: The country of the player who won

properties.label: Currency
properties.description: The currency of the win

properties.label: Amount in Currency
properties.description: The amount of the win in the player's currency

entities.label: Withdrawal Request
entities.description: A request by a player to withdraw funds

properties.label: Request ID
properties.description: The unique identifier for the withdrawal request

properties.label: Player ID
properties.description: The identifier of the player making the request

properties.label: Request Date
properties.description: The date and time of the request

properties.label: Amount
properties.description: The amount of the withdrawal

properties.label: Status
properties.description: The status of the withdrawal request

properties.label: Handling Type
properties.description: The handling type for the withdrawal request

properties.label: Withdrawal Method
properties.description: The method used for the withdrawal

properties.label: Approval Date
properties.description: The date when the withdrawal was approved

properties.label: Rejection Reason
properties.description: The reason for rejection if the withdrawal was rejected

enumerations.label: Player Status
enumerations.description: The status of a player account

enumerations.label: KYC Status
enumerations.description: The Know Your Customer verification status of a player

enumerations.label: Transaction Type
enumerations.description: The type of a financial transaction

enumerations.label: Transaction Status
enumerations.description: The status of a financial transaction

enumerations.label: Responsible Gaming Limit
enumerations.description: Limits set by players for responsible gaming

relationships.label: Participates In
relationships.description: A player participates in a game session

relationships.label: Has Transaction
relationships.description: A player has a financial transaction

relationships.label: Has Bonus Balance
relationships.description: A player has a bonus balance

relationships.label: Places Bet
relationships.description: A player places a sports bet

relationships.label: Has Big Winner
relationships.description: A game has a big winner

relationships.label: Has Session
relationships.description: A game has a game session

relationships.label: Has Bet
relationships.description: A sport event has bets placed on it

relationships.label: Has Player
relationships.description: A white label has registered players

relationships.label: Offers Game
relationships.description: A white label offers games to play

relationships.label: Has Instance
relationships.description: A bonus has instances as bonus balances

relationships.label: Is Big Winner
relationships.description: A player is a big winner
